name: DEADREALM
description:
DEADREALM is a 2D thriller platformer game. You find yourself in an uninviting dimension with no memory of how you got there. A vast place filled with spirits of the dead, and vicious monsters. 

  • Run from nearly unstoppable monsters
  • Find and use hatchets to defend yourself
  • Collect secret documents in each level to unravel more of the realms story, and acquire useful upgrades.
